Basic functions¶

A set of functions to get material properties. Properties are stored in .json file.

Eurocodes 0 and 1¶

ec1.wind.pressure.I_v(z: float, zone: str) → float[source]¶

Calculates the turbulence intensity, Iv(z), at height z. It is defined as the standard deviation of the turbulence divided by the mean wind velocity.

Args:

z (float): vertical distance zone (str): the terrain category

Returns:

float: turbulence intensity

ec1.wind.pressure.c_0(z: float) → float[source]¶

Calculates the orography factor, taken as 1,0 Args:

z (float): vertical distance

Returns:

float: orography factor

ec1.wind.pressure.c_r(z: float, zone: str) → float[source]¶

Calculate the roughness factor

Args:

z (float): vertical distance zone (str): the terrain category

Returns:

float: the roughness factor

ec1.wind.pressure.q_p(z: float, vb0: float, zone: str) → float[source]¶

Calcculates the peak velocity pressure, qp(z), at height z, which includes mean and short-term velocity fluctuations.

Args:

z (float): vertical distance vb0 (float): fundamental value of the basic wind velocity zone (str): the terrain category

Returns:

float: peak velocity pressure

ec1.wind.pressure.v_b(vb_0: float) → float[source]¶

Calculates the basic wind velocity

Args:

vb_0 (float): fundamental value of the basic wind velocity

Returns:

float: basic wind velocity

ec1.wind.pressure.v_m(z: float, vb: float, zone: str) → float[source]¶

Calculates the mean wind velocity, vm(z), at a height z above the terrain. Depends on the terrain roughness and orography and on the basic wind velocity.

Args:

z (float): vertical distance vb (float): basic wind velocity zone (str): the terrain category

Returns:

float: mean wind velocity, vm(z)

Eurocode 2¶

ec2.sls.longterm.creep_coef(t=28, h0=100, rh=65, t0=10, fck=20.0, cem=0.0) → float[source]¶

Calculates the creep coeficient.

Args:

t (int, optional): _description_. Defaults to 28. h0 (int, optional): _description_. Defaults to 100. rh (int, optional): _description_. Defaults to 65. t0 (int, optional): _description_. Defaults to 10. fck (float, optional): _description_. Defaults to 20.0. cem (float, optional): _description_. Defaults to 0.0.

Returns:

float: _description_

ec2.sls.longterm.shrink_strain(t=28, h0=100, ts=3, rh=65, fck=20.0, cem='Type N') → float[source]¶

_summary_

Args:

t (int, optional): _description_. Defaults to 28. h0 (int, optional): _description_. Defaults to 100. ts (int, optional): _description_. Defaults to 3. rh (int, optional): _description_. Defaults to 65. fck (float, optional): _description_. Defaults to 20.0. cem (str, optional): _description_. Defaults to ‘Type N’.

Returns:

float: the total shrinkage strain

ec2.uls.shear.shear_asws(bw: float, d: float, fck: float, g_c: float, fyk: float, g_s: float, cott: float, ved: float, alpha: float) → Tuple[float, float][source]¶

Calculates the design shear reinforcement

Args:

bw (float): beam width d (float): beam depth fck (float): concrete compressive strength g_c (float): concrete partial safety coefficient fyk (float): steel strength g_s (float): steel partial safety coefficient cott (float): truss inclination (cot) ved (float): design shear force alpha (float): coefficient

Returns:

Tuple[float, float]: (shear reinforcement (Asw/s), maximum shear force Vrd.max)

ec2.uls.shear.shear_vrd(bw: float, d: float, fck: float, g_c: float, fyk: float, g_s: float, cott: float, asw_s: float, alpha: float) → Tuple[float, float][source]¶

Calculates the design shear strength Vrds and Vrd.max

Args:

bw (float): beam width d (float): beam depth fck (float): concrete compressive strength g_c (float): concrete partial safety coefficient fyk (float): steel strength g_s (float): steel partial safety coefficient cott (float): truss inclination (cot) asw_s (float): steel transverse area (Asw/s) alpha (float): coefficient

Returns:

Tuple[float, float]: (shear reinforcement (Asw/s), Vrd.max)

ec2.uls.shear.shear_vrdc(bw: float, d: float, fck: float, g_c: float, rho_l: float) → Tuple[float, float, float][source]¶

Shear strength without shear reinforcement

Args:

bw (float): beam width d (float): beam depth fck (float): concrete compressive strength g_c (float): concrete partial safety coefficient rho_l (float): longitudinal reinforcement ratio (As/bd)

Returns:

Tuple[float, float, float]: (vrd.min, vrd.c, vrd [min(vrd.mmin, vrd.c])
